original_title: Tokunaga Hideaki STATEMENT TOUR FINAL at NAGOYA CENTURY HALL
overview: To promote his album Statement, Tokunaga Hideaki set off on a concert tour across Japan. Now, the tour's final show at Nagoya Century Hall is being released as a concert album. In addition to Tokunaga's soulful performance of songs from Statement, the concert also includes a surprise performance by Anzenchitai leader Tamaki Koji.
tagline: Tokunaga Hideaki STATEMENT TOUR FINAL at NAGOYA CENTURY HALL
title: Tokunaga Hideaki STATEMENT TOUR FINAL at NAGOYA CENTURY HALL
